description:
Uzume is an ordinary middle school girl with one unusual trait: she`s a master at card games.  But when someone slips a strange device in her bag on the train, suddenly the game turns real!  Now she`ll have to use her Fantasista Doll, a life-sized female doll that says it will grant her every desire, to fight off the people who will do anything to get the device back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uzume Uzu Uzu: A Shadow Draws Near?
うずめうずうず 忍び寄る怪しい影?
